play.libs

Class LegacyEventSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results.Chunks<java.lang.String>
      • play.libs.LegacyEventSource
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class LegacyEventSource
extends Results.Chunks<java.lang.String>
    This class is deprecated. Please use play.libs.EventSource with an Akka Source.

        public static LegacyEventSource whenConnected(java.util.function.Consumer<LegacyEventSource> callback)
